backend/main.mo: Access control setup and user profile management with role checks, plus type definitions for tools, images, and models.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to impacted frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of multiple frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading fonts and mounting the React app root with main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication state, routing between pages, and conditional profile setup modal display.
frontend/src/components/CustomToolManage: Dialog UI for creating, editing, and deleting custom tools with dynamic property management.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that displays a fallback interface and reload option when runtime errors occur.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main header with navigation, theme toggle, user profile menu, and logout handling based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays a landing/login screen with branding, feature highlights, and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/model/ExampleSet: Manages a list of example setup images, allowing upload, description editing, and removal. Uses ExternalBlob for binary storage handling.
frontend/src/components/model/ExternalBl: Displays an image stored in an ExternalBlob with loading and error states. Shows a spinner until the image loads successfully.
frontend/src/components/model/ModelNotec: Renders a summary card for a model, showing grouped tool summaries across narrative, framework, and execution. Extracts and displays key tool properties for quick overview.
frontend/src/components/ModelBuilder.tsx: Provides a full interface for creating and editing trading models, including tool selection, configuration, custom tools, and example setups.
frontend/src/components/ModelCardSummary: Shows a summary dialog for a model with concise tool property previews and options to go back or save.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with name input and backend save handling.
Identifies which model best matches selected tool observations, computing adherence scores and allowing model selection.
frontend/src/components/ToolConfigDialog: Large dialog component for configuring tool properties, including dynamic form fields based on tool type and zone. Provides save/close callbacks and contains extensive option enums.
frontend/src/components/trade-calendar/T: Calendar day cell showing trade aggregates like P/L, percent, and R-multiple. Supports click interaction when trades are present.
Displays a full month calendar with navigation and weekday headers. Renders day cells and forwards click events for day-level interactions.
Renders a weekly trade calendar view with weekday headers and day cells, plus a button to open the full calendar.
Displays a dialog showing a day's trade aggregates and a list of trades with P/L and direction indicators.
frontend/src/components/trade/BracketOut: Provides buttons to select a bracket closure outcome type for a trade.
frontend/src/components/trade/EmojiMulti: Renders emoji mood options allowing a single emoji to be selected.
frontend/src/components/trade/ManualClos: Numeric input field for entering a manual close price with basic validation.
frontend/src/components/trade/TradeImage: Manages uploading, previewing, and removing trade screenshot images using ExternalBlob objects.
frontend/src/components/trade/TradeOutco: Full editor for completing trade outcomes, including bracket states, notes, mood, images, and close time handling.
frontend/src/components/TradeDetailDialo: Dialog for viewing and editing a trade's outcome using TradeOutcomeEditor. Handles save operations and displays success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/TradeForm.tsx: Complex form for creating or editing trades, including model selection, position sizing, validations, and scenario calculations. Integrates multiple hooks, helpers, and UI components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on models and trades via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, and layout utilities including safe-area and trade form rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Analytics.tsx: Loads models and trades, applies filters, computes analytics metrics, and renders a multi-tab analytics dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays high-level trading stats, equity curve, recent trades, top models, and a weekly trade calendar.
frontend/src/pages/Models.tsx: Models page that lists, creates, edits, deletes, and views trading models using ModelBuilder and ModelViewer.
frontend/src/pages/ModelViewer.tsx: Fetches a model and its trades, computes performance metrics, and shows model details with example images.
frontend/src/pages/Trades.tsx: Trades page that displays, filters, edits, deletes, and analyzes trades with outcome editing and model-based setup identification.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/adherence.t: Functions to filter trades by adherence score and compute adherence-based performance metrics and comparisons.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/brackets.ts: Computes per-bracket performance metrics including hit rates and average R values for bracketed trades.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/distributio: Bins numeric R values into histogram buckets for distribution analysis.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/equityCurve: Computes cumulative equity curve and max drawdown from completed trades.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/htfBias.ts: Derives higher‑timeframe bias from model tools and computes trade performance grouped by bias.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/metrics.ts: Calculates overall performance stats such as win rate, PL, R metrics, and profit factor.
Runs Monte Carlo simulations using empirical R values to model equity paths and summary stats.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/sessionAnal: Determines trade sessions and computes performance metrics grouped by trading session.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/timeBuckets: Computes hourly and weekday trade metrics including counts, win rates, and total P/L for completed trades.
Calculates impact metrics for each tool type by comparing trade performance using that tool against overall baselines.
Provides session inference and filters trades by model, session, and adherence, plus helpers for completed trades.
Buckets trades by a volatility proxy and computes metrics such as win rate, P/L, and R distribution per bucket.
frontend/src/utils/setupIdentifier/adher: Maps observed tools to model conditions and computes adherence scores based on checked conditions.
frontend/src/utils/trade/outcomeMath.ts: Derives bracket closure prices and computes total P/L, percentage P/L, and R:R for a trade from its outcomes.
frontend/src/utils/trade/outcomeModel.ts: Maps between editable bracket outcome state and persisted outcome structures.
frontend/src/utils/trade/reflectionModel: Extracts and merges reflection fields such as notes, mood, images, and decisions on taking the trade again.
frontend/src/utils/trade/tradeCalendar.t: Aggregates completed trades by date and builds a month calendar grid with daily P/L and R stats.
frontend/src/utils/trade/tradeMetrics.ts: Computes total P/L, R:R, and winner/loser status from a trade’s bracket outcomes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to get URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the hash for routing and state management.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requests, known issues, and versioned state for the mobile model builder improvements.
